Articles.Content:
Any word on a fix to the emissive issues we've been dealing with for a while? I've been stuck on Unity 4.2.2 because later revisions don't work with the emissive system without tweaking the files (which never solved the issue for me).

Reference:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25023?p=921862&viewfull=1#post921862

How does Squad make it work on their end?

We will son have new part tools for 1.0.5, huhullll!

Great news!

how do you install the part tools?

EDIT: Never mind, I've got it working

Edited October 17, 2015 by Bev7787

has anyone ever had the issue where when you add part tools to a gameobject it gives nullreference errors? it hasn't happened before, only started a week ago. It is really frustrating because i can't get rid of it unless i start a new project. reimporting or anything doesn't work. It has worked on the same gameobjects before but just recently i'm getting this mess.

it turns out it was a messed up gamedata directory.

Edited October 24, 2015 by fast_de_la_speed
That link is broken. Could you update the thread?

That link is broken. Could you update the thread?

Yep i need the Tool Package too, could anyone upload it and send us the link?

I need it for a Project and i have a Deadline which draws closer and closer ;-)

Here go, but i remember, son we will have the new updated part tools. So, for the ones who can wait, be patience.

The others, here the Part tools link i have.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/i1gcy1std9ociz4/PartTools.zip?dl=0
Hope on a EmissiveBumped - no specular shader!

They said the new part tools will have some shaders surprises...

Hoppe.

They said the new part tools will have some shaders surprises...

Hoppe.

IVA shaders!

Can't wait.

Interested in how these are made...

Do we need the 1.0.5 part tools in order to update any parts mods? I'm fairly new to the whole modding thing, but have been making different parts for myself for the last couple of months, so I'm unsure of how this all works.
Not all. I wont tell you what will and won't work because I don't know but some of my simple part models seem to be working fine without a recompile.
Is there a way to get our hands on the new part tools? I would love to test out the new shaders.
You'll just have to wait.
Updates any time soon? Edited November 19, 2015 by strykersm
Stupid question, but what am I supposed to do with the files, how to install them?

[quote name='sashan']Stupid question, but what am I supposed to do with the files, how to install them?[/QUOTE]
Simply drag and drop the content into the "Assets" folder

Hi!

Do i need to use the API updater on Unity 5 ?

or keep the old version of PartTools 0.23 ?

 

Thx
KSP is not using Unity 5 for now. You must use a 4.x version.
I read a ways back, and last I found, was that Unity 4.3.4 was the last Unity version that could be used with the 0.23 Tools... Is that still true, or can we use the current version of 4.x.x?

On 30/04/2015, 04:59:02, martinezfg11 said:

You don't need it. Just put the Part Tools folder inside your Unity Assets folder.

Which assets folder?

 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\wp8support\Template\Assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\blackberryplayer\assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\androidplayer\assets 

and finally

Unity\Editor\Standard Assets 

 

Which one?

3 minutes ago, Jaffa Cookie said:

Which assets folder?

 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\wp8support\Template\Assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\blackberryplayer\assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\androidplayer\assets 

and finally

Unity\Editor\Standard Assets 

 

Which one?
 

Start the program and you'll see it. It's pretty hard to miss.

1 hour ago, Jaffa Cookie said:

Which assets folder?

 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\wp8support\Template\Assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\blackberryplayer\assets 

Unity\Editor\Data\PlaybackEngines\androidplayer\assets 

and finally

Unity\Editor\Standard Assets 

 

Which one?
 

The assets folder that is in your Project file. I'll try to post some pictures of where when I get home from work.

14 hours ago, sarbian said:

KSP is not using Unity 5 for now. You must use a 4.x version.

Not for everything I'm using a beta Unity 5.1 for Linux and part tools .23 there are some bugs  but for the most part all works fine but, I don't know how to do animation but so far ever think else has worked fine.
the dropbox link says error 404 this has been moved or deleted
